articles.title: Sakinaka rape & murder case: Man gets death
articles.description: A sessions court on Thursday sentenced a 45-year-old man to death, eight months after the brutal rape and murder of a woman inside a tempo in Sakinaka.
articles.content: Sakinaka rape-murder case: Mumbai court convicts 45-year-old manEight months after the rape and murder of a woman in Sakinaka, a sessions court on Monday convicted a 45-year-old man.
